titleStmt.title: The declinatour and protestation of the some some-times [sic] pretended bishops, presented in face of the last Assembly. Refuted and found futile, but full of insolent reproaches, and bold assertions
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.

titleStmt.title: The declinatour and protestation of the some some-times [sic] pretended bishops, presented in face of the last Assembly. Refuted and found futile, but full of insolent reproaches, and bold assertions
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.
Warriston, Archibald Johnston, Lord, 1611-1663.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Revised according to the ordinance of the generall Assembly, by me Mr. A. Ihonstoun .. Edinb. 12 of Feb. 1639.
A reply to: Episcopal Church in Scotland. Declinator and protestation of the archbishops and bishops, of the Church of Scotland, and others their adherents within that kingdome.
At least quire D is in two settings: D1r catchword is (1) "Com-" or (2) "Commissi-".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
